description.value:
You gain a +5 bonus to saving throws and you are immune to the attacks of any creature of level 20 or lower. In addition, the first time you are bloodied in each encounter, you teleport to any unoccupied space you can see, you can spend a healing surge, and you are insubstantial until the end of your next turn.

Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 146.
